A bicycle leaves a young man with a swollen kneecap that paramedics suspect is broken, while picking up a prescription from the chemist ends with a collapse and a trip to hospital

programme.title: Depp v Heard
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the tumultuous defamation trial between Johnny Depp and his former wife Amber Heard- the first in US history to be fully broadcast live. The three-part series considers whether a jury ever be truly impartial in the age of social media. In the first episode, the couple testify about their early love story before the programme advances to some of the most dramatic moments of the trial

programme.title: Depp v Heard
programme.desc: As hostility to Amber Heard grows on social media, the trial reaches one of its most violent and disturbing moments. A violent confrontation between Depp and Heard as they visit Australia results in Depp losing part of his finger with Heard making a shocking allegation

programme.title: Depp v Heard

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment

programme.desc: A US Navy lieutenant is murdered at the Defence Logistics Agency, while visitings the office of an admiral currently away at sea. As the team investigates the scene of the crime, they realise a rare painting found in the admiral's office is actually an elaborate fake placed there after the killing, replacing the stolen original. As the quest to locate the missing artwork gets under way, the agents realise they need the help of an expert. Luckily, Tony's con-artist father has returned to town, having broken up with his fiancee, and is on hand to provide expert advice as the hunt for the killer takes them into the shady world of the black market. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is murdered at the home of Gunnery Sergeant Holt Perkins, and while the victim is initially assumed to be the marine's wife, analysis reveals her to be a convicted thief, presumed to be on the scene as part of a plot to hit Perkins' house. When the agents discover the calling card of notorious terror cell Dragon's Tooth on the body, it becomes clear the murder has been committed as part of a wider agenda, and the team joins forces with the Department of Defence to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A prostitute and what seems to be one of her clients are gunned down in a drive-by shooting, and when it emerges that the would-be John was actually a Navy officer, Gibbs and DiNozzo realise the killings are connected Lex Tarlionas, an incomplete operation to bring justice to those responsible for an attack on a US airport in 1979, which left 100 people dead. The main suspect is a former Colombian drugs kingpin known as Tomas Orlando, and the murdered sex worker was about to hand over crucial DNA evidence that could have connected him to the crime, but now that she is dead, Gibbs and the others must find another way to finally bring Orlando in. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo teams up with his girlfriend, ATF agent Zoe Keates, to investigate the circumstances surrounding the death of a US Marine in what initially seems like a simple road accident. The team reveals the dead man did indeed die due to a broken neck sustained during a crash, but someone shot at him first. As DiNozzo and Keates pursue their inquiry, they discover the victim's death is connected to a controversial ATF plan to place traceable firearms in the criminal system, and then follow them to the heads of crime organisations. Naval crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team examines the apparently accidental death of a man trying to solve the killing of his son in Chile 30 years earlier. As the investigations gather pace, the officers are embroiled in a belated murder trial

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates a disabled boy's death in an apartment fire, focusing inquiries not only on a tenant who lived in the same building and had been linked to several previous blazes, but also on the victim's parents, who had struggled to cope with the strain of looking after him. With Jerry Orbach, Dianne Wiest and guest star Rudolph Giuliani

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a woman found bludgeoned to death with a paving slab at a subway station. A petty thief leads them to a man with a history of mental problems, recently released from prison, who confesses to the crime and a previous murder. However, the victim's ex-husband wants to know why the suspect was walking the streets in the first place

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the suspicious death of a reality TV contestant. They discover the show's producers had been provoking bad feeling toward the dead man among his fellow participants, while a cameraman reveals that his last moments were captured on film. However, the incriminating tape cannot be found. Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green have difficulty pinning the death of a strangled woman on their prime suspect, drug dealer Francis 'Taz' Partell. However, while questioning one of his former associates, they discover new evidence indicating he was responsible for another murder in the Bronx

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Kyle Friedgen is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, but while his case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, his life and reputation are marred by suspicion that he got away with murder. Determined to clear his name in full, Friedgen volunteers to be court-martialled, on the condition that the NCIS team conducts its own investigation. Meanwhile, Bishop and Jake discuss their marital problems. Naval crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham, with Jamie Bamber

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The two Marine brothers of a sailor battling leukaemia are killed in the line of duty, and to spare the servicemen's family further grief, the secretary of the US Navy seeks the NCIS team's help in locating a suitable bone marrow donor. Meanwhile, Bishop returns home to Oklahoma for Thanksgiving. Military crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky is assaulted by a man who claims to have previously undisclosed information about his half-brother, who died decades ago. While his NCIS colleagues traces the attacker's whereabouts, Dr Mallard recalls the emotional final days he spent with his sibling. Elsewhere, as the holiday season approaches, Bishop and Jake discuss the future of their relationship. Naval crime drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women. Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Part one of two. A tourist yacht cruising off the coast of Somalia opens fire on a boat, killing a sheikh and his wife. Goren and Eames investigate and find a link to a Somali arms dealer at the centre of a federal case, and are shocked to discover that Captain Danny Ross could be implicated. The crime drama returns, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Eric Bogosian

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A team investigates a young French model's claim that, after being brought to New York on a billionaire's private jet, she was raped by him at his 50th birthday party. The girl reveals there was another youngster on the plane, so Benson and Stabler try to trace the whereabouts of the potential witness

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are appalled to discover that students at Westmore University watched a live internet broadcast of a woman being raped and never contacted the police. Another live stream is discovered showing the victim in an abandoned building begging for help, and when the detectives manage to trace the address they find a link to an abduction case that is still unsolved

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny arrests the notorious Raymundo Salazar on suspicion of murder and is determined to end his illicit activities - but the drug lord resists and the officer finds himself in a fight to protect his family. Detective thriller, starring Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Shade and Angie recruit Liam, Jules and Becca for help investigating a valuable comic-book theft involving a local sorority girl

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: A stalker targets a female golf pro during a golf tournament. Romance blooms between Shade and actress Willow Maitland, while Angie seeks out some much-needed fun

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US marine visits the home of his former captain, only to find the man has been killed, and the killer is waiting inside the property. While the soldier escapes with his life, the attacker gets away too. It quickly emerges the prime suspect is Qasim, an Afghan translator evidence, and evidence points against him, until it is discovered he has a brother, who is loyal to the Taliban. The subsequent chain of evidence leads Gibbs and Bishop to Afghanistan

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Naval intelligence ensign is killed in an unusual car accident. Gibbs and his team are reunited with old friend Ned Dorneget, who is now working with NCIS cyber operations, and NSA attorney Jake Malloy to investigate the case, and discover a conspiracy involving terrorist recruitment on the internet

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a violinist with the New York Symphony Orchestra and find the trail leads back to her Svengali-like conductor. However, they have a difficult job getting the case to trial, with a reluctant witness, a suspicious judge and a talented lawyer standing between them and a guilty verdict

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A gang leader is stabbed to death in a prison scuffle, and Briscoe and Green uncover a number of suspects as it becomes clear the victim had numerous enemies on both sides of the law. The investigation results in a charge, but McCoy faces an uphill battle to convict the accused. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a clothes shop owner during an apparent robbery. An open lock suggests someone who works there was responsible, and the trail eventually leads to the son of the dead man's business partner, whose shady dealings were at risk of being exposed. However, the suspect flees to Israel before police have a chance to question him

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An Iraqi immigrant kills a female veteran of the second Gulf War for torturing her brother at Abu Ghraib prison. However, the detectives learn the accused's lawyer plans to defend his client as an enemy combatant, immune from prosecution under the terms of the Geneva Convention, and that they may have no jurisdiction over the case. Starring Jesse L Martin and Dennis Farina

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman is accused of murdering her husband's mistress. Although the crime is found to be premeditated, the defendant's lawyer claims his client's actions were prompted by post-traumatic stress syndrome arising from the September 11 terrorist attack. Starring Dennis Farina

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A recently paroled prison gang member is shot dead, and suspicion falls on former crime associates - until his battle behind bars with a corrections officer comes to light. McCoy then learns the defence attorney will claim his client took action to ward off a threat by the con and his 'brotherhood'. Guest starring Candice Bergen

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The first instalment of a two-part crossover with NCIS: New Orleans sees the Washington, DC team co-operating with their colleagues from the Big Easy to investigate a spate of lethal poisonings on board a New Orleans-to-DC flight. All the evidence seems to point to missing chef Luca, who happens to be Abby's brother, so the two investigative services join forces to locate him, and find out why a private tech firm seems to have been targetted by the killer. Naval crime drama, guest starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A deep-sea diver is murdered on the job, and his co-workers all become suspects. However, when they return to the surface, they must remain in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days. With each of their suspects confined within a tank, the NCIS team must complete an unorthodox investigation from the outside. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A killer targets the survivors of a high-school massacre when they return to the scene of the tragic event. Meanwhile, Hotch worries his son is being bullied. Drama, starring Thomas Gibson

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman who hosts a talk show that specialises in catching sexual predators is helped by the detectives to apprehend her latest target, but they also discover she has a stalker

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gruesome work of art in a painter's studio leads to the discovery of a woman's body in the flat above. Benson and Stabler investigate the victim's personal contacts and establish she could have suffered bullying at the wine business she co-founded. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Jackie discover a sinister side to the glamorous world of modelling after a reality TV star dies during a show at New York Fashion Week. Frank tries to clear the name of the family's local priest, and Jamie continues to search for the truth about the Blue Templar. Crime drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg, with Peter Gerety (Rubicon)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny investigates the murder of a tourist while Frank tries to fend off the media's attempts to sensationalise the story. A Haitian man becomes the chief suspect in the case - but neither of the Reagans is convinced of his guilt. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: A high-rise office cleaner witnesses a possible murder in the building next door and hires Shade and Angie to investigate. Willow Maitland tags along to gain first-hand experience of being a PI

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.desc: A Belgian priest living in exile in Britain during the Second World War becomes a secret agent for the Allies, but his first mission is a disaster, leading to the capture of a resistance leader. programme.desc: The widow of an armoured car driver swears revenge on the criminals who killed him - leading them to turn on each other. Crime drama, staring Michael Craig and Billie Whitelaw

programme.title: Regina: The First Woman Rabbi
programme.desc: Documentary about Regina Jonas, who made history when she became the first officially ordained female rabbi in 1935. Through personal correspondence and newspaper articles she left behind, this film tells her story, from her upbringing in Berlin as the daughter of an Orthodox Jewish peddler, through her studies to her ordination. Featuring Rachel Weisz as the voice of Regina

Drama, starring Alessandro Rabelo and Charles Durning

programme.title: Strike It Lucky
programme.desc: Michael Barrymore hosts the madcap game show, in which three teams of two prove seek to progress along a board game-style path by answering questions. Each duo are allowed to determine how many spaces they would like to move by answering the corresponding number of questions.
